txt.en:
'We have had great successes here in Moria already, [placeholder], and Brogur has gone eastward with many of our people seeking the Twenty-first Hall and the royal houses of Durin.

'I am worried by this haste. Yes, we have achieved a great victory with the discovery of the Heart of Fire, but I fear that Brogur will advance too far and get in over his head.

'Travel to the Chamber of Leadership off the Twenty-first Hall in Zelem-melek and warn my cousin against this move.'
'Welcome to the Chamber of Leadership, [placeholder]! From here I will lead my people to even greater glory in Moria!'
'Brogur will be in the Chamber of Leadership, a small room off the Twenty-first Hall in Zelem-melek.'
'Welcome to the Chamber of Leadership, [placeholder]! From here I will lead our people to even greater glory in Moria!'
Encouraged by their success within the mines, many of the dwarves have followed Brogur further east, to the Twenty-first Hall.

Brogur is in the Chamber of Leadership, a small room off the Twenty-first Hall in Zelem-melek.\n\nBrogur has brought a company of dwarves further east into Moria, and has set up a new base of operations in the Chamber of Leadership, off the Twenty-first Hall.
